ill give it a try and because i have utorrent ill seed it for a whillle but how long do you think the download will take thanks
how do you uncompress the file i really want to play so please comment back ! =)
how do you uncompress the file ?

@addy53 : Its a 2 parted .rar file, So youll need WinRAR. If you do, Just open any part, Then wait for it to read the files(a couple of seconds). Then select the folder that appears(named 'CS Source' and click on 'Extract To'. No installation needed, So just extract and open the Start.bat.
@Pennywise4333 : I don't know exactly , Now there is only 2 seeders, Me and someone else, And 100 peers( That's what uTorrent says, It's more accurate than PB )
G-Unit_hacker, I followed all of the directions and when i open it and try to connect to a server and just freezes or says failed to connect to server. you know whats wrong? or what to do?
@passafire : copy the servers address and type in the console : Connect {the address} and hit enter. If it don't connect it means the server is down.
